value.stringValue: @[{![Opportunity].OwnerId}] Action: Add Access Workspace. This opportunity has been identified as having Access Workspace applicable products, yet it does not have Access Workspace attached at this time. #[WorkspaceMissing] All opportunities must have Access Workspace – Standard Edition and Customer Success plan added unless they are not applicable to the base product of the opportunity. The Access Workspace product name is division specific and the 5% should be charged against “Access Workspace – Standard Edition – XXX” where XXX is the division of the applicable base product

value.stringValue: Action: Please ensure Access Workspace -Standard Edition is added to this opportunity within the next 5 days. This opportunity has been identified as having Access Workspace applicable products, yet it does not have Access Workspace attached at this time. #WorkspaceMissing All opportunities must have Access Workspace – Standard Edition and Customer Success plan added unless they are not applicable to the base product of the opportunity. The Access Workspace product name is division specific and the 5% should be charged against “Access Workspace – Standard Edition – XXX” where XXX is the division of the applicable base product.
Add Access Workspace – Standard Edition To This Opportunity
Remember to add Access Workspace and Customer Success to applicable products
